channel.title: How would I set up an option?

item.title: How would I set up an option?
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

[code]program New;

const
UseWait = True; //True for Yes, False for No
WaitTime = 5; //Seconds to Wait between Clicks

{
SCRIPT USER: DO NOT EDIT BELOW THIS LINE
}

var
WaitFor: Integer;

begin
if UseWait then
WaitFor := WaitTime * 1000;
repeat
MouseBox(5, 5, 5, 5);
Wait(WaitFor);
until(IsFKeyDown(2)); //Always have a failsafe, in this case, Press F2 to stop
end;[/code]

XD
Forgot about that,
Good Point Richie.

I was assuming they’d put 0 if they didn’t wanna wait

Read full topic
item.source: How would I set up an option?

item.title: How would I set up an option?
item.dc:creator: @r_ch_e r!ch!e
item.description:
@r_ch_e wrote:

If…Then Statements

begin if UseWait = True then begin WaitFor := WaitTime * 1000; repeat MouseBox(5, 5, 5, 5); Wait(WaitFor); until(IsFKeyDown(2)); //Always have a failsafe, in this case, Press F2 to stop end else Writeln('Wait is off'); end.

Read full topic
item.source: How would I set up an option?

item.title: How would I set up an option?
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

[code]program New;

const
UseWait = True; //True for Yes, False for No
WaitTime = 5; //Seconds to Wait between Clicks

{
SCRIPT USER: DO NOT EDIT BELOW THIS LINE
}

var
WaitFor: Integer;

begin
WaitFor := WaitTime * 1000;
repeat
MouseBox(5, 5, 5, 5);
Wait(WaitFor);
until(IsFKeyDown(2)); //Always have a failsafe, in this case, Press F2 to stop
end;[/code]

And to all advanced coders, Yes, I do know how Wait works.

item.title: How would I set up an option?
item.dc:creator: @TheKidXXX TheKidXXX
item.description:
@TheKidXXX wrote:

Curently working on my first useful script and would like to know how would I have an option for useing a timer or not useing a timer. Would like for the option to be at top kinda like this.

program new;
UseWait = Yes/no?
 begin
   repeat
    MouseBox(5, 5, 5, 5);
    wait(5000);
   untill(false);
end.

Read full topic
item.source: How would I set up an option?
